title: Steam Deck - SteamOS 3.5.13 Preview improves WiFi, brings LED brightness controls
description: One missed from yesterday Friday, January 5th is that Valve released another Preview update of SteamOS for Steam Deck with a couple more useful changes.

title: The big Portal 2 mod Portal: Revolution is out now on Steam
description: Portal: Revolution is a new fan-made campaign for Valve's popular puzzle game Portal 2, and it's now available free on Steam for owners of the game to install and play through.

title: GOG has a Classic Winter Sale live to build up your retro library
description: Need some more games that won't destroy your bank balance and will work across a lot of lower-end PCs too? GOG have what you need with the Classic Winter Sale now on.

title: Ray-Tracing performance uplift coming to the AMD RADV Linux graphics driver
description: The open source AMD RADV Vulkan driver is set to get some nice looking performance improvements for Ray-Tracing, which should release along with Mesa 24.0.
